metadata.title: Ege Dulundu - WordPress Expert & Full-Stack Developer
metadata.description: Making websites faster. WordPress optimization, performance consulting, and full-stack development services.

hero.name: Ege Dulundu
hero.tagline: Making websites faster. WordPress expert + full-stack developer.

bio.introduction: I specialize in WordPress optimization and full-stack development, helping businesses improve their website performance and build scalable web applications. From speed optimization to custom development, I deliver results that matter.
bio.experience: 3+ years of professional experience optimizing WordPress sites and building modern web applications.

about.title: Passionate about creating impactful web experiences
about.description: With over 5 years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in building scalable web applications using modern technologies. My expertise includes React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. I'm passionate about creating elegant solutions to complex problems and sharing knowledge with the developer community.

experience.title: Professional Journey
experience.subtitle: A timeline of my professional growth and key achievements

items.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
items.description: Led the development of enterprise-scale web applications, mentored junior developers, and implemented best practices for code quality and performance optimization.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
items.description: Developed and maintained multiple client projects, implemented responsive designs, and integrated third-party APIs for enhanced functionality.

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description: Created responsive and interactive user interfaces, collaborated with designers, and optimized application performance.
